sn41.4:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu macchikasande viharanti ambatakavane.
sn41.4:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn41.4:1.3: “adhivasentu me, bhante thera, svatanaya gokule bhattan”ti.
sn41.4:1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati theranam bhikkhunam adhivasanam viditva utthayasana there bhikkhu abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn41.4:1.6: Atha kho thera bhikkhu tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena cittassa gahapatino gokulam tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidimsu.
sn41.4:2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati there bhikkhu panitena sappipayasena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
sn41.4:2.2: Atha kho thera bhikkhu bhuttavino onitapattapanino utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn41.4:2.3: Cittopi kho gahapati “sesakam vissajjetha”ti vatva there bhikkhu pitthito pitthito anubandhi.
sn41.4:2.4: Tena kho pana samayena unham hoti kuthitam;
sn41.4:2.5: te ca thera bhikkhu paveliyamanena manne kayena gacchanti, yatha tam bhojanam bhuttavino.
sn41.4:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahako tasmim bhikkhusanghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.4:3.2: Atha kho ayasma mahako ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.4:3.3: “sadhu khvassa, bhante thera, sitako ca vato vayeyya, abbhasampilapo ca assa, devo ca ekamekam phusayeyya”ti.
sn41.4:4.1: “Sadhu khvassa, avuso mahaka, yam sitako ca vato vayeyya, abbhasampilapo ca assa, devo ca ekamekam phusayeyya”ti.
sn41.4:4.2: Atha kho ayasma mahako tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhari yatha sitako ca vato vayi, abbhasampilapo ca assa, devo ca ekamekam phusi.
sn41.4:4.4: “yo kho imasmim bhikkhusanghe sabbanavako bhikkhu tassayam evarupo iddhanubhavo”ti.
sn41.4:4.5: Atha kho ayasma mahako aramam sampapunitva ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.4:4.10: Atha kho thera bhikkhu yathaviharam agamamsu.
sn41.4:5.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yenayasma mahako tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati ayasmantam mahakam etadavoca:
sn41.4:5.2: “sadhu me, bhante, ayyo mahako uttari manussadhammam iddhipatihariyam dassetu”ti.
sn41.4:5.3: “Tena hi tvam, gahapati, alinde uttarasangam pannapetva tinakalapam okasehi”ti.
sn41.4:5.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho citto gahapati ayasmato mahakassa patissutva alinde uttarasangam pannapetva tinakalapam okasesi.
sn41.4:5.5: Atha kho ayasma mahako viharam pavisitva sucighatikam datva tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhari yatha talacchiggalena ca aggalantarikaya ca acci nikkhamitva tinani jhapesi, uttarasangam na jhapesi.
sn41.4:5.6: Atha kho citto gahapati uttarasangam papphotetva samviggo lomahatthajato ekamantam atthasi.
sn41.4:5.7: Atha kho ayasma mahako vihara nikkhamitva cittam gahapatim etadavoca:
sn41.4:6.8: Atha kho ayasma mahako senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya macchikasandamha pakkami.
sn41.4:6.9: Yam macchikasandamha pakkami, tatha pakkantova ahosi;
